content.html: Hi @JuliaHB1, if you include 'autistic' in a list of pejoratives you clearly mean to use it as a pejorative. Deleting it while claiming it's not offensive to do that isn't good enough. @TalkTV are clearly fine with their presenters being unapologetically ableist online.
